name: Daily Collection
query:
SELECT
    `tabPayment Entry`.posting_date as "Posting Date:Date/Posting Date:100",
    `tabPayment Entry`.name as "ID:Link/Payment Entry:140",
    `tabPayment Entry`.party as "Customer Code:Link/Customer:150",
    `tabPayment Entry`.party_name as "Customer Name:Data/Customer Name:150",
    `tabPayment Entry`.adist_sales_person as "Sales Person:Data/Sales Person:150",
    `tabPayment Entry`.paid_amount as "Paid Amount:Currency/Paid Amount:100",
    `tabPayment Entry`.mode_of_payment as "Mode:Data/Mode:115",
    `tabPayment Entry`.paid_to as "Account:Data/Account:150"

FROM
  `tabPayment Entry`

WHERE
    `tabPayment Entry`.`docstatus` = 1 
    AND posting_date >= %(from_date)s 
    AND posting_date <= %(to_date)s
    AND (%(customer)s IS NULL OR %(customer)s = '' OR party = %(customer)s)
    AND (%(sales_person)s IS NULL OR %(sales_person)s = '' OR adist_sales_person = %(sales_person)s)
ORDER BY
    `tabPayment Entry`.`posting_date` desc
